function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Frequent use of washing machines and dryers in the built environment can increase the risk of spreading contagious diseases through contaminated laundry.","Impact":"Potential spread of infections and illnesses among occupants in the building if proper hygiene and sanitation measures are not in place.","Mitigation":"Implement regular cleaning and maintenance of washing machines and dryers, encourage proper hand hygiene, and educate occupants on the importance of hygienic laundry practices.","Technologies":"Implement antimicrobial and self-sanitizing surfaces in washing machines and dryers, use ultraviolet (UV) light technology for disinfection, and consider implementing smart sensors for monitoring and controlling laundry appliances.","People":"Occupants in the building, especially those who come in contact with contaminated laundry.","Owner":"Building management, maintenance staff, and occupants."},{"Description":"Refrigerators are commonly used in Kuwaiti residences for storing food, and the presence of multiple units in each residence may lead to cross-contamination if not maintained properly.","Impact":"Risk of foodborne illness and spoilage due to improper storage and maintenance of refrigerators.","Mitigation":"Implement regular cleaning and maintenance schedules for refrigerators, educate occupants on food safety practices, and monitor refrigerator temperature and cleanliness.","Technologies":"Use of antimicrobial materials and surfaces inside the refrigerators, implement smart sensors for temperature monitoring, and consider UV-C disinfection for refrigerator interiors.","People":"Occupants using the refrigerators and handling stored food, as well as maintenance staff responsible for refrigerator upkeep.","Owner":"Building management, maintenance staff, and occupants."},{"Description":"Gas-based ovens in Kuwait contribute to indoor air quality challenges and may pose a risk if not properly ventilated.","Impact":"Increased indoor air pollution due to the operation of gas ovens, leading to respiratory issues and potential aggravation of existing health conditions.","Mitigation":"Ensure proper ventilation in kitchen areas with gas ovens, conduct regular maintenance of oven exhaust systems, and educate occupants on indoor air quality and ventilation best practices.","Technologies":"Implement exhaust hoods and ventilation systems in kitchens, use indoor air quality sensors for monitoring, and consider upgrading to gas ovens with improved combustion efficiency.","People":"Occupants in the building who are exposed to indoor air pollution from gas oven operation.","Owner":"Building management, maintenance staff, and occupants."}]}
